14.title: Yoshi is tired of being smaller then the others...

choices: Stick to slow to savor the growth/bigness
Grow at a moderate pace
Grow fast and be huge fast
143.content:
“I want to be able to change my size anytime I want, from this dinky lame size to past everything and anything, no limits, just nothing but the ability to grow however big I want endlessly and return to normal whenever I please.” The Green Yoshi said with glee, wagging his tail in anticipation on his deepest desire to happen.

He waited for a response, however there was no response from the voice after a short while, which lead to the Yoshi feeling disappointed that his deepest desire wouldn’t be fulfilled at all, the Yoshi flumped onto the floor and gave a deep sigh. He closed his eyes and imagined what if his wish became true, he would be able to become immense in size. He imagined growing at a fast pace seeing the planet disappear around him, then the solar system, his growth continued untill he started to become closer to galaxy sized and further beyond as he imagined himself continuing growing in size soon dwarfing the universe by a massive margin. He was enjoying his deep thoughts of growing immense, whispering to himself how much he would love to do this, as he secretly always wanted to be large, or even grow continuously. He became too busy imagining himself still growing in size, which at this point, he already imagined himself towering over the gigaverse, that unknown to him, the source of the voice came back.

“I see you want to become a Yoshi of great size” the voice went, causing the Yoshi to stop in his imaging stance. The Yoshi looked around the area to see if he wasn’t hearing things, but thankfully, the voice was real. “Such a wish from a Yoshi wanting to be an immense, gargantuan size…something I admire”. The voice continued, “You’re the first in a long time who wants to be massive, let alone grow themselves whenever to such sizes”.

The Yoshi sprung up with hope for his wish to become true flood back “Does that mean it is possible for my desire to become true”.

“Well of course, I admire other Yoshis willing to be huge.” The voice went, “Your wish is granted”.

The Yoshi let out a squee upon hearing this as he started jumping for joy. “Thank you, thank you, thank you, whoever you are” went the Yoshi. His dream was almost to become true and he couldn’t wait for some good macroness.

“it’s my pleasure to grant ones wish” the voice went, “Now for me to give you such power, I must take control of your body briefly, just to give you the growth ability, as I need to concentrate and have you to absorb this power”.

Suddenly, the Yoshi’s body started to float off the ground slowly and stopped fairly high in the sky, a strange looking circular barrier came around the Yoshi. “Don’t fret fellow Yoshi, this is all part of the procedure” the Voice went. Shortly afterwards, the inside of the barrier started to change colour to complete black, as the Yoshi started to feel something going around as well as inside his body, whatever it was it had a cold feeling to it. Soon after he stopped feeling whatever it was going around his body and started to feel more of whatever it was inside of his body getting stronger, as if something is trying to help him grow in size. “You may feel something else in a bit, which is also part of this procedure” the Voice went.

The strange force inside his body was starting to get stronger, then soon after, the barrier started to close in onto the Yoshi, giving the impression that the Yoshi was growing in size, even though he wasn’t. The barrier reached to the Yoshi, before it slowed down until it touched the top of his head and bottom of his boots. The Yoshi was able to move about but kept bumping into the area of the barrier closing in on him. A few minutes later the Yoshi felt his body being controlled again and became positioned into a ball shape position, the Yoshi let out a small yelp worried what’s going on, though he then heard the voice say “Don’t worry, this is just a small simulation that’s part of the whole procedure, it’s almost done as well”.

It wasn’t long until the barrier was completely covering the Yoshi, as if something sucked the air out of it, then suddenly, the barrier broke and the Yoshi felt his body bolt back to normal, however one thing the Yoshi saw really briefly was what looked like an vast area of darkness with clusters of light and round shapes of different colours and sizes around him before all disappearing around him, in the sense that they were becoming smaller than him, did he see himself outgrowing the Universe.

The Yoshi then felt his body slowly being brought back down to the ground. Once he reached the ground, the voice came back and said “You can now grow in size to your heart’s content; I made it so you won’t tire out as easily due to your current default size, I had to give you more power due to your size so you won’t tire out as fast, compared to if you were at least twice as big.

“Thank you ever so much whoever you are” went the Yoshi, still ecstatic over the fact his request to be able to grow to whatever size he wants is now fulfilled. “I must know who you are so I can thank you in person for gifting me an amazing gift”.

The voice gave a chuckle, “Well you got to grow in size to well past reality, like how you requested earlier and you can then thank me properly. We can also have a small discussion about something; all I want to ask for you to do is not to cause too much major destruction to your home planet, I’ll make sure anything else that’s in your way during your growth escapade won’t be effected by your massive size, as well as repair any major damage you cause to your home planet via accident”. The Yoshi gave a nod in agreement, he felt that if he was given the power to grow immensely, he should keep some sort of promise “By the way, I like to know your name, so then we can great each other when you met me”.

“The names Albert” said the Yoshi.

“Good to know, I guess I will be seeing you soon then”. Then, a brief light flashed in front of Albert, reveling an image of what looked like a large Yoshi with strange markings over his body, the figure expanded in size rapidly. Albert did get a glimpse of it, the figure looked like it was a Red Yoshi, though he couldn’t quite catch it as the figure expanded too fast for him to look properly as well as the flash of light.

It was time though, time for him to start his growing adventure. Albert decided just to test it out at first to see if it really can do so, as well as to get use to it. Albert closed his eyes and concentrated on his body growing a small bit, he slowly started to increase in size, going from his original size of 3ft to 4ft then to 6ft tall before stopping. Looking at his new size, he enjoyed the feeling of growth; he repeated the process and made his body increase in size again, till he reached 10ft. He then decided to do one more growth small growth burst as he concentrated on himself growing slowly in size till he reached 25ft.

“Wow this is awesome” went Albert, not realizing that his voice is deeper than before. Albert decided to return to normal size so he can get a feel of what it Is like, he concentrated on himself losing his new found size from his growth powers, he went from 25ft to 20ft and then shortly afterwards reached his original size of 3ft in which then he felt a force halt him completely. Albert looked around; everything was back to how it was before he started his first taste of growth. Albert was thankful that he was able to return to his normal size and not go any further; he would have absolutely hated that completely, despite being able to be immensely huge.

Albert heard a something that sounded like a whisper, it was the voice from earlier, “That force is there to stop you from going any further, regardless how hard you try, its beyond impossible for you to do so”. Albert sighed with relief; whoever it was that gave him this power is someone he wants to thank in person.

Albert spent some more time practicing his new powers by repeating what he did before but making how much he grows bigger each time by about 5ft extra, sometimes he wouldn’t go back to normal, he would make himself a smaller large size compared to his normal size.

“This is amazing, I getting to love growing myself” Albert went, “Think I’ll just do nothing but continuously grow soon”. Albert continued on changing his size, with only increasing it for each growth session by about 5ft or so each time. He kept on doing this till he was 100ft tall.

At this point he felt he was ready for some major continuous growing action. He decided to get the most of it and best feeling to return to normal size then just grow to his heart’s content.

Once he returned to normal, he took a deep breath, did some stretches and then got himself ready to begin his continuous growth. He started slowly increasing in size, feeling his body expand as he soon got to 25ft tall he decided to grow a bit quicker, his growth speed started to increase as he soon reached 50ft…60ft….75ft… he was still enjoying making himself grow. Once he reached 100ft tall, he decided to grow faster, he concentrated on growing more as he grew 50ft bigger in a short time span, he looked around his area seeing himself becoming bigger than the trees. One concern though, that would be what the other Yoshis would think of him, though he’ll cross that bridge when it comes. He continued to grow reaching 300ft tall, loving every moment of it. He soon reached 500ft, still loving it how he can grow himself when he wants, he pushed himself again, casing his body to rapidly increase more, 550ft..700ft…1000ft, continuing onward until he reached 2500ft, at which point he stopped growing.

Albert looked around the area, seeing how much everything was now that hes over 800 times bigger than he was before, a lot of the trees would barely reach the sole part of his boots and he wouldn’t even be able to see a Yoshi clearly at this size. He decided on how he would grow next in terms of speed, in which he went for...

Albert loved the feeling of growth he experienced when he grew himself to 2500ft tall, the sense of his body expanding, the feeling of the growth over his body and the fact he was no longer short compared to his kind, but a massive, towering Yoshi. His orange coloured boots, were still intact, albeit somewhat tight. He expected they will break if he grew anymore, but didn’t care either way.

“Man, I love this power” Albert said while hugging himself, loving his new found size, “I honestly want to get super huge sooner so I can get the best feeling of being a immensely massive Yoshi, just growing till my heart’s content…way past reality”.

He was too busy loving his new found size, he forgot that his voice was much louder than it was before as well as a crowd of Yoshis forming around him, all looking up to see above them all a gigantic 2500ft tall Yoshi, the Yoshis flinched when he spoke about loving his power. Among them all, some were mesmerized by this towering Yoshi and others were worried or fearful about what this Yoshi would do.

Albert then started to look around his surroundings to get a view from where he was, seeing over tree tops and other places among the area he was situated. When he looked down he spotted below him a cluster of different coloured dots, he realized that he has attracted the attention of multiple Yoshis to him. His best case of action would be to assure them he means no harm as well as to about his actions, though he had to be quite about it.

He bent down and tilted his head towards the crowd of Yoshis he was towering over, he told all the Yoshis below him in a hushed tone “No need to worry everyone, I’m just using my new found powers to the fullest, I’m going to go to grow to sizes that are so large everything will be nothing to me”. He heard from the Yoshis a mix of different reactions among them. “No need to worry, I would never dream of harming anyone here ever, I suggest to either get out of the way and avoid my growing body, or even climb on me, but I probably wouldn’t recommend as I don’t know if anyone who does will survive when I out grow all of reality.” He heard shocked gasps from the crowd of Yoshis beneath him, then a bunch of murmuring about how can that be and if hes crazy as of many other things.

Albert heard the voice again “I’ll make sure any Yoshis on you are safe and sound, I’ll move them to safety on your body if say you go into the ocean as well as make sure that any that feel unsafe are returned back to the island or moved somewhere on your body, their choice.”

“Actually, anyone who was thinking of climbing on me, do so, you’ll be safe regardless what happens” Albert went, “Just be quick though, I want to start growing super massive, the one who gave me the powers said those on me will be safe, I want to meet him and thank him for granting me this power. I’ll be planning on growing in 10 minutes so be quick please.” The Yoshis surrounding Albert all looked at each other and had a quick talk whether it would be wise to climb onto him or find somewhere safe to be to avoid the Yoshis path of growth.

During this time, he was looking around the area looking at his surroundings, as well as thinking of how the Yoshis on him will feel as he decides to grow to immense sizes. 10 Minutes went by, but Albert fought he’ll wait for a bit longer as he noticed some Yoshis weren’t on him fully. He waited another 10 minutes, despite the itch for him growing as much as he wants to, he felt it was best for them to be on him or away from him first. Eventually they were on him or away from him.

Albert decided it’s time to grow more, he said quietly to those Yoshis on his body “I’m about to grow more now, I may not even stop until I outgrow the planet, the sun, galaxy…or even all of reality”. The Yoshis already on his body were all wondering what it would be like as well as if it was wise to be on him as well.

Albert got himself ready and concentrated on his body growing in size, he decided to start of slow in size but then push on and grow faster the bigger he got, reaching about 3000ft tall in a short time. As he continued to ascended higher in size to 5000ft tall, he noticed some other Yoshi’s that didn’t climb on earlier were attempting to get on now, he stopped growing for the time being. On one hand, He was somewhat annoyed that they started now, but on the other hand, he thought that they probably wanted to be on him once he started growing again, the voice came back and said “I know how much you want to grow more, so I’ll transport those Yoshis further onto your body.”

The Yoshis that started to climb onto him heard the voice informing them they are being moved further up so the Yoshi could continue growing again, the Yoshis felt their body become lightweight and lifted further upwards to somewhere safe. As quietly as he could, he said “Those on my boots, they may break soon, as they’ve been tight since I reached around 2500ft tall.” Once the Yoshis were settled again, he made sure if other Yoshis didn’t want to go on a tour on him as he grows, about 20% of the Island Population decided not to, seeing as how they feel that something bad might happen, even with being told that there’s nothing to worry about. Once everyone was ready, Albert started to grow again, though as soon as he started to grow, his boots ripped apart, thankfully the Yoshis on them were safe. Albert was ready for his extreme growth, he concentrated on his body expanding in size once again. His body slowly started to grow in size as he reached 5500ft tall in height, he spent his time enjoying himself grow large slowly pushing how much hes growing as he got bigger. Eventually he reached 7000ft tall, with him stopping to take a view of how big he is now, as well as see how the Yoshis on him were doing, luckily they were doing fine, even if some weren’t clinging onto him and are sitting on him or standing on him, despite his size, he even noticed some Yoshi’s were hugging the part they were on, seemingly that they love how big he is, all Albert could do was blush at this as it seems that some of the ones he could see where loving how big he is, in fact, there were Yoshis on other parts of his body loving his size.

Albert decided to push his size faster now, as he started to grow once again. He once again started to grow slow so he wouldn’t startle the Yoshis on him. Once he grew another 1000ft tall, he pushed on in size again, by increasing his speed on how much he grows by a bit, he decided that he’ll only stop growing to move somewhere safe without potential crushing anything with his size. As he reached 10000ft tall he pushed on in size faster, he was enjoying the growth he was having for himself so he wanted to grow quicker, he thought that the Yoshis on him wouldn’t mind as he hasn’t stopped growing since he was at 7000ft tall. He decided to push on in size while getting ready to get off the island and move into the ocean. He wanted to make sure he was big enough before going into the ocean so he can have all those Yoshis stay on his body as he grows bigger as he reached 15000ft tall, towering over the Island, continuing pushing onwards till he reached 20000ft tall. At this point he was amazed by how much he has grew himself by, and this is not only the beginning, but nothing compared to his desired size. He proceeded to move off the island being careful not to cause any damage or extra damage that he didn’t notice at all and into the ocean, upon entering the ocean he noticed that the ocean only reached about half way up his body, just a bit above his tail, as well as all the Yoshis who were on the lower half of his body are now on his upper half of his body, most noticeably his nose, but also on other parts of his upper body.

After a short while observing his massive size, he was ready to grow again, but this time he will grow even more than the last time. He has no idea when he will stop, but he plans on making it a surprise for himself. He still wanted to avoid causing damage or destruction to the areas around him as he grows. He started his major growth-plosion by slowly growing in size but enough for him to notice & feel the sensation of growth as he water reached 25000ft tall, only then to push his growth even more reaching 30000ft tall in about half the time as last time. He was enjoying his growth a lot as he continued to push on even faster by growing to 50k ft tall. Albert could see far and wide based on how big he is now, he looked up thinking that there is still a lot of room for him to grow even bigger once he leaves the planets gravitation pull. He pushed on hard now for his growth, accelerating faster than before, reaching 100kft tall in half the time he went from 30k -50kft, only to then to grow again to 250kft in half the time before hand in which he stopped for the time being.

He started growing again, reaching 500k ft tall only to then double in size again swiftly reaching 1000000ft tall (189.3 miles tall), at this point he could easily see a good portion of the earth as he looms over his home island by a massive margin. He couldn’t believe how much bigger he is now and able to become now as well as he started to grow even more reaching 946.9 miles tall, then doubling to 1893.94 miles tall, at which at this point his started to get pulled off the earth, which was good as he no longer had to worry about causing major damage anymore. Albert knew that it would be the best time for a major growth spurt, he closed his eyes and concentrated on growing even bigger, growing 7575.76 miles taller to become 9469.7 miles tall in one big surge. Upon opening his eyes, he became shocked at how huge he is now, which only fueled his desire to become even bigger. He once again closed his eyes and started to grow even more, reaching 14204.5 miles tall then 18939.4 miles tall 94697.0 miles tall.. 189394…378788…946970…1893940 miles tall and he continued until…

14331.content:
Albert’s enjoyment of his growth started to get the best of him as he continued to keep his eyes closed while he continued to excel in size as he passed 5000000 miles tall, already looming over the sun thus making him the biggest thing in the solar system, but he wanted to be even bigger, the biggest thing ever, as he continued to grow and pass 10000000 miles tall in size then hitting 25000000 miles tall not too much later on. Without him knowing, his body was slowly being moved away from the earth to keep a safe distance from it, it didn’t even distract him or even throw him off growing himself. As Albert continued to grow, some of the Yoshis on him were amazed he has continued on growing without stopping for some time, some were concerned that he might get into danger and something bad could potentially happen to them, while others were enjoying the sense of the Yoshi continuous growing. Albert reached 50000000 miles without much of a sweat as he continued onwards in size, looming over the planets in the solar system.

A Small group of Yoshis were located on the nose of the continuously growing Albert were having a conversation about the events happening, “Man, this Yoshi sure doesn’t seem to want to stop growing” Said a Blue Yoshi as he rolled onto his back to look into the vast reaches of space. “He was already titanic before he started this massive growth spurt, like is he even gonna stop at all to rest and get a feel of his massive size?” Questioned a Black Yoshi to the Blue Yoshi. “I honestly couldn’t even guess when he will stop, I mean, in comparison to his gargantuan size, were nothing, at least hes doesn’t have any plans on doing something bad to us of course”, the Blue Yoshi said.

“Isn’t he the Yoshi who was on the short side compared to us lot?” a Yellow Yoshi queried, “I mean, he was short compared to the other residents of the island, he even was known for being rather frustrated at being so short”. “I think so” A Red Yoshi replied back, “Wasn’t his name like Albert or something? How exactly is he able to grow so massive as he desires right now just seems so weird, did he find something mysterious that absorbed into him? Was it a wish maybe?”

Suddenly the Yoshis were startled by a voice that seemingly came from nowhere caught their attention, “I can answer that” the voice went, “A fellow Yoshi named Albert desired to be able to grow at will to any giant size he desires, even like he said to the point where everything is nothing to him, so essentially way past all of reality and potentially way beyond that.” The Yoshis facial expressions were of in completely shock, looking at each other at major disbelief. “But how exactly does he not end up bumping into anything while hes growing endlessly?” the Blue Yoshi asked being at a loss for words at this point. “Simply put, while hes in his growth session, like he is right now, I’ll make sure he doesn’t cause any major damage to anything important or with life on it even, despite the fact I told him to be careful with it, but he seemed to prove his worth before he outgrew the planet and continued his major growth spurt. Of course in the event he does hit into something with life on it, be it accident or not, let’s say it would be like it didn’t happen at all.”

“So what are you exactly then?” the Red Yoshi asked, “Also, how did you know Albert’s predicament and allowed him to now be able to become immense in size?” The red Yoshis question was answered as a figure appeared in front of them, it was the same one that appeared before Albert after giving his powers. The Yoshis looked in awe as they saw a large figure that looked like a Yoshi, in the skin colour if Red. “What you are seeing is a projection of me, rather than my true self, as I am far to immense to be seen, as I’ve became a Yoshi of gigantic sizes past all life due to my feeling of being large but went too far and became beyond reality sized and then some, something I’ve been for many, many years. This Yoshi, Albert is the first one in a long time to not only want to grow huge, but past reality to meet me, other Yoshis have done this, while others want it to be a protector of their home world, galaxy or universe, after of course meting up with me.” Explained the Yoshi, “I was able to hear about Alberts predicament of being short and hating it, of course hearing him wanting to outgrow all of reality took me by surprise, hence why I allowed him to grow as big as he wants, I admired his desire of wanting to be an immense size, same with all the other Yoshis wanting to grow freely”.

The Yoshis looked at each other, seeing how there’s a Yoshi way beyond everything that could grant another Yoshi the power to grow as big as they like. “I’m kind of jealous that he can now grow to any size he wants now, I mean, hes still growing and does seem to want to stop at all, he must love it to bits, wish I was aware of you so I could do the same as well, just to see what it is like.” The Red Yoshi said, with the other Yoshis near him agreeing with him, they seemingly wanting to grow large as well. “Well as of now I am unable to do so; I need to rest up after doing as it can tire me out if I do too many Yoshis in a short period of time.” The figure said, “I can tell you however, Albert is already at 100000000 miles tall, I’ve got a feeling he will stop soon to admire his new size, for what he will do next is in the air still, I best be heading off as well.” The figure faded away from view with the Yoshis talking about what has happened.

Albert was still growing in size edging towards 110000000 miles tall. He felt like he has grown enough for the time being since he has the intent to stop soon, unknown to him though he has grown an immense amount since he started his major growth-plosion after closing his eyes. He got to 115000000 miles tall before he started to slow down considerably, with him stopping at 115967000 miles tall. Albert waited for a moment before he opened his eyes, in which the first thing he sees aside from the vast reaches of space, there was a tiny glowing ball of light approximately no bigger than a single pea to him, in which he was just amazed how much he has grown since he last stopped without anything going wrong, though while he was looking around the area, something caught him off guard, there was a smaller, nearly hard to see green and blue dot in front of him, in fact it was so hard to see he had to squint and carefully move his head closer to it so he could get an idea on what it is.

Upon getting closer to it, he was able to see what it was; it was the Earth, at the size of a sand grain compared to him, his eyes perked open with the thought that he is this huge now compared to what he was originally made him. He moved one of his fingers close to the earth, but at a safe distance away to get a full comparison, still amazed that he has grown a lot, he retreated his finger back and continued to stare at the earth in awe, looming over it and the planets in the solar system.

Meanwhile, back on earth, reports of a large figure were being reported worldwide, the reports were unsure whether the figure is going to cause destruction to the planet due to its large size. With people panicking about, it wasn’t until other Yoshis within the area informed them that he isn’t there to do no harm, just to make himself huge via growth powers, which confused everyone, but they didn’t feel the need to answer due to still being concerned if It did happen.

Albert, still at the size of 115967000 miles tall, kept on looking at the small speck that is the earth, with lots of thought going through his head, like how much he has grown and how everyone, be it on him or on earth are reacting, he has a hunch those on him are fine but likely concerned about him potentially being careless while those on earth are likely freaking out about the earth being in danger with his large size, though he has a feeling the Yoshis back on the Island informed people about whats going on in someway or another.

“I’ve grown so much since I’ve obtained this power” Albert said, still in awe about his size, “I used to be such a dinky size compared to the other Yoshis of my age, but now I immensely huge, and I haven’t even made a dent on how much more I want to grow, I still want to outgrow all of reality, I still have a lot more growing too do, I just hope that I don’t cause any catastrophes, even if he’s making sure I don’t.“

Some time went pass since Albert stopped growing himself, was about to start growing himself again, though this time, he was debating on how he would do so again, as well as if he would have his eyes closed or not for it to be a surprise after he has started to grow again and by a lot. After mulling it over for some time, Albert decided that for his next session of his continuous growing he will grow...
